cs5031.catalogplayer.catalog
Interface Catalog

All Known Implementing Classes:
MyCatalog
public interface Catalog

A generic interface for a catalog of resources. All that is required is that the catalog provide a search interface that can handle queries in some appropriate language and returns paged result sets.

Author:
avoss

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Document search(Query query)
          Do a search on the catalog and return a SearchResult.
